text:
The final day of Orient City's big summer event,
"Hero City Summer Festa"-

[Player], who had received a work break ahead of time,
heads to the designated place
within the venue.

Canes, who had arrived earlier, is waving towards them.
When their eyes meet, he happily rushes over.

name: Canes
text:
Hello, [Player]-san!
Sorry for having you keep me company until the last day.
You've been a great help for me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's not a serious matter, but it's something difficult for me...
Would you mind giving me some advice?

options.text: What are we going to do?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
N-no, actually it's not for fun, but I have a favor...
Oh, but [Player]-san, if you're okay with it, I'd like to play together later!

name: Canes
text:
Actually, I'm planning to buy souvenirs now.
But there are too many shops and items,
and I can't decide what to choose at all!

name: Canes
text:
My father said, "Choosing souvenirs tests your eye for quality",
and "Those guys will rip you off!"
so I'm even more worried...

options.text: Well, some shops are like that.
Did he get ripped off before...?
Yes, choosing souvenirs is a battle.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It is!?
I'm glad I had the courage to contact you, [Player]-san...

name: Canes
text:
I think if I try to choose a souvenir by myself,
I'll end up picking something weird,
so would you mind helping me choose?

Over the past few days,
Canes has completely come to trust [Player],
and looks at them pleadingly.

options.text: Aren't you choosing souvenirs with Sterio-kun?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Actually, I'm planning to secretly buy something for Sterio too.
So, please keep it a secret from him.

name: Canes
text:
Yay! [Player]-san,
thank you very much.
Let's go right away, I'm counting on you!

note: This bit is specifically funny because Canes still insist on calling the player with honorifics the entire epilogue.

options.text: You don't have to be so formal.
We can speak more like friends.

name: Canes
text:
Eh? But [Player]-san, you are older than me,
so you are like a senior to me...
Hmm, are you really sure?

name: Canes
text:
I'm a little uncomfortable,
but I'll try my best to be careful- I'll do it.
Alright, let's go!

[Player] and Canes
head to the shops
lined up near the entrance.

There, various goods were handled,
from venue-exclusive commemorative items
and merchandise supervised by hero agencies, to Orient City specialties.

Overwhelmed not only by the number of shops, but also
by the many customers gathered to buy souvenirs,
Canes explains who he wants to give what to.

name: Canes
text:
First, for my father, I'm torn between
a local specialty from Earth
and something unique to Hero Festa...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's a good idea.
My father likes alcohol, so maybe I'll buy something that goes well with it...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh~ there's something like that?
It must be something you can only buy here, so I'll decide on a mug cup for my father!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, my father told me about that!
Earth students buy wooden swords as souvenirs, right?
Then... maybe I'll do that too?

name: Canes
text:
Before, when I asked my mother what she liked,
she said "fashionable" and "strong stuff".
Fashionable is one thing, but what would a strong souvenir be like?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Traditional local crafts...
What a beautiful pattern.
My mother might like it-
Excuse me, I'll take this!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, right, my mother is a fan of Polaris Mask.
Alright, I'll get a bromide as a souvenir!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm? What's this-
A keychain with a dragon wrapped around a sword?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So cool~!
This is fashionable and looks strong, my mother will surely like it!
[Player]-san, you have good taste!

name: Canes
text:
Next is Sterio. Hmm, I think he'd definitely
be happy with food... But should I give him
something he wouldn't normally choose?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, that's definitely true!
Maybe I'll have some too...
I want to remember the taste and recreate it with Muirauka I ingredients.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's a good idea...
Oh, this brush might be made of a material he likes.
Alright, I'll buy this!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What~, what's that! Ahahaha!
That's funny...
I'll buy that branching one, along with those sweets over there.

name: Canes
text:
Now, my family's portion is decided.
Next, the portions to distribute to neighbors,
and a thank-you gift for Goro-san-

Based on the information from Canes,
[Player] suggests souvenirs.
They repeat this exchange several times-

name: Canes
text:
We're done~ thank you!
[Player]-san, thanks to you,
I bought all the souvenirs for everyone!

name: Canes
text:
...Oh~!?
I forgot my own part!!

name: Canes
text:
But, it's fine, I guess. I've used up
all the souvenir money anyway, and I can't
think of anything I "absolutely want" either.

name: Canes
text:
It's enough for me to get to go
shopping with you like this, [Player]-san.
Memories can be souvenirs too, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahaha, that's not true.
I learned from everyone that expressing yourself is important.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
......
But, um... can I ask for one selfish thing?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, no, that's too much!
[Player]-san, your kindness alone is enough for me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Oh, right.
Can I ask for one selfish thing from you?

options.text: Then let's at least make it tangible.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Tangible, you mean how-
Oh, a commemorative photo!
Let's take one right away, [Player]-san!

text:
Canes and [Player] stand shoulder to shoulder
in front of the monument in the venue,
and look at the device's inner camera.

name: Canes
text:
Hehe, I'm happy.
[Player]-san, thank you
for everything.

name: Canes
text:
...Um, if you don't mind, here.
It's nothing much, but it's my thanks
for everything you've done for me.

What Canes cautiously offered to [Player]
was a bracelet woven from
red and black leather cords.

name: Canes
text:
This is something I made by processing leather.
It's not as good as the souvenirs
from Orient City, but...

options.text: You made it yourself, that's amazing!
Was giving it to me your true intention all along?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
N-no!
[Player]-san, of course I hoped for a chance to give it to you, but...!

text:
[Player] accepts the gift from Canes
and expresses their gratitude.

name: Canes
text:
...[Player]-san.
Sterio and I will return to
Muirauka I tomorrow.

name: Canes
text:
I'll talk to my parents now, and take care of
various procedures... I think it will be a while
before I actually start hero activities, but-

The boy, as if resolute,
looks directly into [Player]'s eyes
and declares.

name: Canes
text:
-Someday, I will definitely
stand before you as a hero.
Will you observe me again then?

name: Canes
text:
I already know that any "Observer" can transform me,
but still, you were the first to
observe my potential...

options.text: I'll look forward to that day.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
-Yes!
I'm counting on you then...
Oh, I'll be relying on you again, [Player]-san!

options.text: I hope we can work together someday.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
-Yes!
I'm counting on you then...
Oh, I'll be relying on you again, [Player]-san!

options.text: That's good, but just come visit me normally.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...!! No, that's...
I'm happy you're inviting me, but I'll hold off on thinking about that for now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]-san, you are really kind, so if I lean on your kindness too much, I might become useless...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
When I can properly balance my family business and hero work, I want to come visit you.
At that time, please take care of me again.

text:
Canes pledges growth and reunion,
and shakes hands firmly with [Player].

Hero City is bathed in the evening glow.
Inspired by the determined boy, or perhaps
to hide his flushed cheeks-
